description: While this command has only one filter operation currently available, it nevertheless presents with a comparable interface to the MRtrix3 commands maskfilter and mrfilter commands.

examples.title: Apply a mesh smoothing filter (currently the only filter available
examples.description: The usage of this command may cause confusion due to the generic interface despite only one filtering operation being currently available. This simple example usage is therefore provided for clarity.

arguments.description: the filter to apply.Options are: smooth
